20110128151102.000|20110128151105.000|TR0|internet has been cut, cell phones have 
20110128151105.000|20110128151107.000|TR0|been cut.
20110128151107.000|20110128151110.000|TR0|
20110128151110.000|20110128151112.000|TR0|You can't send an SMS.  The only way to

20110128152243.000|20110128152245.000|TR0|a minimum when it comes to trying to
